hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Initialize a counter for the timeout (2 minutes / 30 seconds) max_lb_error_attempts=5 lb_attempts=1 lb_error_sleep_time=30
max_db_error_attempts=6 db_attempts=1 db_error_sleep_time=10
# Wait for LoadBalancer URL to become available while true; do # Retrieve the ELB URL LB_URL=$(kubectl get svc store-service -n dev-store-app -o jsonpath='{.status.loadBalancer.ingress[0].hostname}')
if [ ! -z "$LB_URL" ]; then echo "LoadBalancer URL is now available: $LB_URL"
# Check for database connection error RESPONSE=$(curl -s http://$LB_URL) if echo "$RESPONSE" | grep -q "Database connection error"; then echo "Database connection error detected. Attempt $db_attempts of $max_db_error_attempts" if [ $db_attempts -eq $max_db_error_attempts ]; then echo "LoadBalancer URL is available, but database is unavailable after 60 seconds, exiting." exit 1 fi ((db_attempts++)) sleep $db_error_sleep_time else echo "No database connection error, proceeding with the pipeline." exit 0 fi else if [ $lb_attempts -eq $max_lb_error_attempts ]; then echo "LoadBalancer URL not available after 2 minutes, exiting." exit 1 fi echo "Waiting for LoadBalancer URL to become available... Attempt $lb_attempts of $max_lb_error_attempts" ((lb_attempts++)) sleep $lb_error_sleep_time fi done
